attributes.additional_details: To get this draconian smoking ban lifted. Who the hell are these health Nazis to tell us not to smoke? And as for passive smoke-crap!! If they're that bothered about our health then ban all petrol driven  motor vehicles and diesel trains. Close down all steel works and nuclear reactors. In fact just tell everyone to stay inside for the rest of thier life.

rejection.details: Please see petition "Amend the smoking ban".
